mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(username, password, permission, email) VALUES(#{username}, #{password}, #{permission}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT user.*, role.id as role_id, role.name as role_name,permission.id as permission_id, permission.name as permission_name,permission.role_id as p_role_id FROM user LEFT JOIN role ON user.role_id = role.id LEFT JOIN permission ON permission.role_id = role.id WHERE user.username = #{username} AND user.is_deleted = 0
